name: BADASS MAX - Hallow Death
description:
BADASS MAX - Hallow Death

Halloween is coming and something dark it's about to fall on the world. Who are you going to call? The gho... Ups! Sorry, it's because of the song...
BADASS MAX! He's going to save us!

If you like frenzy shooting, pure action, jump and kill enemies of all kind, join Max in his fight to save Halloween and humankind in this retro style 2D shooter, and I'll asure that you'll have MAX fun!

Buttons

- Use the arrow keys to move!

- Use the mouse to shoot!

Enjoy the ride, baby!

Follow Max on Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/mrgamingbear/
